media:group.media:title: [VECTORS 1] Fundamental Properties of Vectors
media:group.media:description:
Fundamental Properties of Vectors - Refresher lecture - Fundamentals, Linear combinations, Dot product, Cross product.

King's College London Physics Programme
Year 1 Maths Video Lecture

CONTENTS:
- Fundamentals of vectors [0:10]
- Operations on vectors [1:13]
- Linear combinations of vectors [2:00]
- Dot product [5:00]
- Cross product [9:31]
- Pseudovectors [14:19]

Francisco (Paco) Rodríguez Fortuño
Senior Lecturer King's College London
